name: Droption
description:
Dodge and Match!

Controls:

  • Move Left / Right:
    • Arrow Keys (Left / Right)
    • A / D
    • Click left / Right side of screen

Objective:

  • Dodge Falling Blocks
  • Try to line up Semi-Circles to form complete blocks
  • Complete a row of complete blocks to clear the row

Made by Ari Lotter and Attila "Gabriel" Branyiczky for TO Jam #13.

Version History:

  • 0.9.3:
    • Updated Pause Screen
    • Added pressing "R" key to Restart game
    • Added sfx to character movement and full-block completion
  • 0.9.2: Minor fixes
  • 0.9.1: Initial release
